rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with built-in storage and display areas following Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area featuring warm colors, terracotta tiles, and natural lighting. A focal point is the indoor-outdoor transition area leading to the rooftop terrace.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, with a Mediterranean-style dining table and chairs made of reclaimed wood.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional Mediterranean design with stone countertops and hand-painted ceramic tiles. Features efficient workspace and ample storage.

openings.description: A decorative wooden door matching the interior design.
Large windows offering natural light and a view of the landscaped courtyard.
A sliding glass door for an open-plan feel between kitchen and dining area.

features.corridor: A narrow corridor connecting rooms, integrated with storage solutions in line with Vastu principles to encourage smooth flow of energy.
features.balcony: A small balcony adjacent to the living room serving as a transitional space to the rooftop terrace.
features.utilities: Built-in utilities and smart home integration ensuring efficient energy use.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom designed for relaxation. Vastu principles are observed in the orientation and layout to promote balance.

rooms.name: En-Suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern fixtures combined with Mediterranean tiles and fixtures ensuring comfort and style.

openings.description: A private access door to the en-suite bathroom.
High windows that allow ample natural light while preserving privacy.

features.staircase: A central staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, integrated into an open plan design with minimal barriers as per Vastu principles.
features.rooftop_entrance: Access to the rooftop terrace is through a private door from the master bedroom, ensuring security and exclusivity.

roof_deck.description: A Mediterranean-style roof deck with pergola, outdoor seating, and space for relaxation. Designed keeping in mind Vastu considerations to align energy flow.
